name: OBAKE
description:
Chant to keep the wells purified or face the wrath of the Oni!  Of course, those aren't the only things you'll have to worry about as you try to survive the night!  

A Short Japanese-themed Horror Game made in 48 hours (non consecutive) for the Miz 1 Game Jam.  

https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1
